title: With the Johnson & Johnson vaccine back in use, Arkansans decide which shot to get
author: Parris Kane
description: The Johnson & Johnson vaccine is now back in use after a brief pause recommended by the CDC and FDA. The vaccine was put under review after six cases of a rare blood clotting disorder were reported in women ages 18 through 49. Nine more were found while the vaccine was under review. But with over 7 million doses given, there is less than a . 000002 percent chance of developing the side effect.
